actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the support of Congress on behalf of the principle of free emigration for all people.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Expresses the support of Congress on behalf of the principle of free emigration for all people, and the efforts of the United States delegation to the United Nations Commission on Human Rights toward achieving this goal.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the support of Congress on behalf of the principle of free emigration for all people.
